citeinfo.title: Mineral Commodity Summaries 2025 - ZIRCONIUM AND HAFNIUM Data Release

descript.abstract: This data release contains the U.S. salient statistics and world production data extracted from the ZIRCONIUM AND HAFNIUM data sheet of the USGS Mineral Commodity Summaries 2025.
descript.purpose: Published on an annual basis, the USGS Mineral Commodity Summaries report is the earliest Government publication to furnish estimates covering nonfuel mineral industry data. Data sheets contain information on the domestic industry structure, Government programs, tariffs, and 5-year salient statistics for over 90 individual minerals and materials.
descript.supplinf: Where possible, data are those finalized for publication in the 2023 U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals. For 2024, USGS National Minerals Information Center provided estimates based on available data from USGS surveys of the industry, other industry sources, and mineral commodity specialist research.

idinfo.accconst: None. Please see 'Distribution Info' for details.
idinfo.useconst: None. Users are advised to read the dataset's metadata thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations.

citeinfo.title: USGS National Minerals Information Center Zirconium and Hafnium Web Page
citeinfo.othercit: Provides information and links to all available USGS National Minerals Information Center publications about ZIRCONIUM AND HAFNIUM by publication type and year.

attracc.attraccr: Where possible, data for all years except 2024 have been finalized for publication in the U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals; otherwise the data are noted as estimated.

dataqual.logic: Data were checked to ensure that they match those published in the Mineral Commodity Summaries 2025. Data were peer reviewed by Mineral Commodity Specialists and approved by supervisors in compliance with USGS fundamental science practices.
dataqual.complete: This data release contains tabular data found in the associated publication Mineral Commodity Summaries 2025 (MCS 2025); additional detailed information is available in the full text version of MCS 2025.

citeinfo.title: USGS Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals

srcinfo.srccontr: Source of salient statistics for 2020 through 2023 and basis for estimates for 2024. The data in the Minerals Yearbook are based on USGS surveys sent to companies involved in the industry for each mineral commodity.
trade statistics for 2020 through 2023 and basis of trade statistics estimates for 2024

procstep.procdesc: Salient statistics for each mineral commodity were compiled from published 2023 U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals chapters or from finalized tables of those to be published. Data for 2024 were estimated based on available 2024 data and industry trends. Estimates for world production were made for 2024 in collaboration with USGS National Minerals Information Center Global Minerals Analysis specialists using best available data.

enttyp.enttypd: Comma Separated Value (CSV) file containing data.

attr.attrdef: Publication containing the data.
Mineral commodity for which the data were compiled.

edom.edomvd: Zirconium and Hafnium. Data in metric tons unless otherwise noted.

attr.attrdef: Year for which the data were compiled.

U.S. production: Zirconium ores and concentrates (ZrO2 content). Calculated ZrO2 content as 65% of gross production. Data are estimated for the most recent year. In 2020, data were rounded to the nearest 100,000 to avoid disclosing company proprietary data.
Imports: Zirconium ores and concentrates (ZrO2 content). Calculated ZrO2 content as 65% of gross production. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Imports: Zirconium, unwrought, powder, and waste and scrap. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Imports: Zirconium, wrought. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Imports: Hafnium, unwrought, powder, and waste and scrap. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Imports: Hafnium, wrought. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Zirconium ores and concentrates (ZrO2 content). Calculated ZrO2 content as 65% of gross production. Excludes zircon in mixed mineral concentrates.Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Zirconium, unwrought, powder, and waste and scrap. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Zirconium, wrought. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Hafnium, unwrought, including powders. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Hafnium, wrought. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Consumption: Apparent, zirconium ores and concentrates (ZrO2 content). Calculated ZrO2 content as 65% of gross production. Apparent consumption is defined as production + imports – exports.

Price: Zircon, dollars per metric ton (gross weight): Premium grade, cost, insurance, and freight, China. Source: Argus Media group, Argus Nonferrous Metals, annual average. Data are estimated for the most recent year.

rdom.attrunit: dollars per metric ton, gross weight

attr.attrdef: Price: Zircon, dollars per metric ton (gross weight): Imported. Unit value based on annual United States imports for consumption from Australia, Senegal, and South Africa. Data are estimated for the most recent year.

rdom.attrunit: dollars per metric ton, gross weight

attr.attrdef: Price: Zirconium, sponge, ex-works China, dollars per kilogram. Source: Argus Media group, Argus Nonferrous Metals, annual average. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Price: Hafnium, unwrought, dollars per kilogram. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Net import reliance as a percentage of apparent consumption: Zirconium ores and concentrates. Net import reliance is defined as imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Net import reliance as a percentage of apparent consumption: Hafnium. Net import reliance is defined as imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.

overview.eaover: Two CSV files were produced from the data published in the Mineral Commodity Summaries 2025. One includes U.S. Salient Statistics for production, consumption, trade, and other data pertinent to ZIRCONIUM AND HAFNIUM for the years 2020 to 2024. The other includes world ZIRCONIUM AND HAFNIUM production totals for countries that had production in 2023 and (or) 2024.
overview.eadetcit: Companion data for ZIRCONIUM AND HAFNIUM data sheet of Mineral Commodity Summaries 2025

cntaddr.address: Denver Federal Center, Building 810, Mail Stop 302

distinfo.distliab: Unless otherwise stated, all data, metadata and related materials are considered to satisfy the quality standards relative to the purpose for which the data were collected. Although these data and associated metadata have been reviewed for accuracy and completeness and approved for release by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the display or utility of the data on any other system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
